translationtableentry.text: La regione è dominata da una potente fortezza romana, il cui esercito d'élite conquisterà le aree circostanti.\nSi consiglia vivamente che tutti e 5 i giocatori giochino in squadra per sconfiggerla.
translationtableentry.result: The region is dominated by a mighty Roman stronghold, whose elite army is going to conquer the surrounding areas.\nIt is strongly recommended that all 5 players play as a team to defeat it.

translationtableentry.text: La región está dominada por una poderosa fortaleza romana, cuyo ejército de élite va a conquistar los alrededores.\nSe recomienda encarecidamente que los 5 jugadores jueguen en equipo para derrotarla.
translationtableentry.result: The region is dominated by a mighty Roman stronghold, whose elite army is going to conquer the surrounding areas.\nIt is strongly recommended that all 5 players play as a team to defeat it.
